Articles.Content:
[0.23] CommandoAir's Custom Flags

Custom flags for all your flag needs!

Hello there, everybody.

I have never before seen a mod dedicated to flags in KSP. I have seen many mods that include them, but never a mod that is solely dedicated to flags. So I decided to make a few myself. I may or may not post more flag packs, it depends if I can come up with any ideas or not. I do take requests for flags. But for now I present you with these.

News:

Updated forum post; re-done screen-shots and made them the same size and put them into an IMGUR album making the post look neater. Also updated "Simple Flags Pack" to V1.1

Nation Flags Pack V1.1

This mod implements the flags of different nations into KSP as useable flags.

Download: http://www./?mqtx86mexbb2xha

Current Flags:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Simple Flags Pack V1.1

This mod implements flags of simple and flat design into KSP as useable flags.

Download: https://www./?4sqf331c7sd5dng

Current Flags:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

For all packs here you can find the version history with change logs in the readme files.

If anybody knows how to put these in a spoiler, please tell me.

Also, if any of the IMGUR albums have really small images, just change the image selected and they should return to normal size.

Licence:

CC BY-ND

Attribution-NoDerivs

You may share and use my flags however you like as long as they go un-changed and in whole, credit me.

Edited December 22, 2013 by CommandoAir

Awesome Pack, and good work!

Just to point out thought, there have been pure flag-packs in the past featuring national flags, but that shouldn't discourage you.

PS, by in the past I mean in .21 or .20, I don't quite remember which...
Great pack! Could you also add the flags of the European Union and the United Federation of Planets?

Added European Union and United Federation of Planets flags to the "Nation Flags Pack".

Thanks for all the positive feedback guys

Edited December 13, 2013 by CommandoAir
Just updated the "Simple Flags Pack" and the forum post. Should look neater and be nicer to read through now
Please don't forget, if you have any requests I will be happy to give it a shot
I haven't tested it myself, but it should work with 0.23. If it doesn't, please post here and let me know so I can attempt to fix it.
